decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the end of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: A500-A-001-P01, A500-A-002-P01, A500-A-010-P01, A500-A-020-P01, A500-A-021-P01, A500-A-011-P01, A500-A-022-P01, A500-A-040-P01, A500-A-050-P03, A500-A-060-P01, A500-A-070-P01, A500-A-071-P01, A500-A-080-P01, 4234 M 100 rev P2, 4234 PH 100 rev P2, 4234 M 101 rev P1, A500 230518 Design and Access Statement dated 15/05/2023, Heritage Statement by Jon Lowe Heritage ref 00473 v1 dated May 2023, M&E Scope of Works Humble Crumble by Environmental Engineering Partnership dated May 2023.

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
Condition : 3 - All new external work shall be carried out in materials that resemble, as closely as possible, in colour and texture those of the existing building, unless otherwise specified in the approved application. 

Reason: To safeguard the appearance of the premises and the character of the immediate area in accordance with the requirements of policy D1 and D2 of the London Borough of Camden Local Plan 2017. 
Condition : 4 - The opening hours of the business, and use of any air handling equipment, shall be limited to the following times: 08:00 hours to 22:00 hours - Monday to Saturday, and 09:00 to 21:00 on Sundays. The doors to the order point shall be securely closed outside these hours.

Reason: To safeguard the amenity of the adjoining premises and the area generally in accordance with policies A1and A4 of the London Borough of Camden Local Plan 2017.
Condition : 5 - Cooking operations on-site shall be limited only to stewing, baking and heating/boiling, and there shall be no frying, grilling, roasting or other food preparation that primarily involves cooking in hot oils or fats.
 


Reason: To protect the amenity of local residents from strong fumes and odours, and to protect local school children from the negative health impacts associated with traditional hot takeaway foods, in accordance with Policy A4 of the London Borough of Camden Local Plan 2017 Policy E9 of the London Plan 2021.
description: Change of use from Pet Accessories Shop (Class E) to dessert takeaway (Sui Generis). External facade alterations to windows, doors and new order point, internal fit out including new water, electrical and mechanical systems.
